title: Graphic designer / web designer
job_overview:
We're looking for a talented graphic designer (also having web design skills is a big bonus and preferred). 

Key Responsibilities

For this role, you must have 5+ years of experience and the following capability:

- Corporate design (brochures, flyers, presentations etc)
- Social media posts
- Print
- Banners
- Web design (UI/UX)
- EDM / Email
- Ad creatives
- Brand identity / Branding

Agency Experience:
• Previous agency experience is highly desirable (but not required), bringing a fast-paced, multi-client mindset to the role.

Soft Skills:
• Excellent communication skills.
• Ability to work independently and as part of a collaborative team.
• Strong organizational skills with a keen attention to detail.

What We Offer
• Competitive compensation and incentives.
• Opportunity to work in a fast-paced, innovative environment.
• Continuous learning and professional development.
• Collaborative and supportive team culture.


How to Apply

We’d love to hear from you. Please attach your resume, cover letter, and your portfolio when applying.
